Helen Walker

Word of the Day: Day 3 - Strength

Jul 29, 2015

So you've probably got this by now, today it's my turn to reply to Wayne. And this is a tough word, because it has so many possible interpretations. And, despite my immediate thoughts, not all of them are entirely positive.

I'll be honest when we were brainstorming the list of words this one was mine. And my inspiration was Wayne. But then that's the point of friends - they see in us the things we can't see in ourselves. So here is Wayne's doodle:

Word of the day is 'Strength' #PositivePostIts #Doodle #PostIts http://www.WayneHanley.com/blog/2015/07/29/doodle-a-day3/

A photo posted by @byteyp on Jul 29, 2015 at 7:39am PDT

I know from my work with colleagues how hard it is for people to see the ways in which they are remarkable, the joy of working as a coach is to be able to hold that mirror up to people even if it makes them squirm and then to try and help them accept the scary truth about the ways in which they are remarkable. But that is also the role of friendship, to have people rejoice in the ways in which we are unique and talented. Because sometimes it's way too hard to do that for ourselves.

It's day 3 of mine and @byteyp's #PositivePostIts. Today's word is #Strength You can read my musings on that here... http://helenwalker.net/2015/07/29/word-of-the-day-day-3-strength/ #Friendship

A photo posted by Helen Walker (@h313n1w) on Jul 29, 2015 at 8:09am PDT </div> </blockquote>
